response.overview: Video installation “Ruins” is an imaginary travel through the memory and a try to recall some moments and happenings. While the participants are being remembered through their actions, gestures and words, environments look motionless and unchangeable. Therefore we see them as poetic testimonies of what has happened. This video is focused on environments that, when you see them from wider perspective, are also unsteady and elusive.
response.title: Ruins
